basement.description:
You are in a basement. An ordinary one.

 You make out a safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a chest. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You scan the room, seeing a trunk. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Silly rack, silly, empty, good for nothing rack.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

workshop.description:
You've just sauntered into a workshop. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

canteen.description:
You arrive in a canteen. A normal kind of place.

 You scan the room for a platter, and you find a platter. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the platter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

cookhouse.description:
You're now in a cookhouse.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

salon.description:
You've just sauntered into a salon.

 Hey, want to see a locker? Look over there, a locker. Huh, weird.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the mantelpiece. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

office.description:
You are in an office. An usual one.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

shower.description:
You find yourself in a shower. An ordinary one.

 You see a dresser.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

closet.description:
You've just sauntered into a closet.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

recreation zone.description:
You are in a recreation zone. An usual kind of place.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket in the corner.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The basket is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.

kitchen.description:
You're now in the kitchen.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.
